main.settings.staging
=====================

.. py:module:: main.settings.staging

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Part of Semper-KI software

   Silvio Weging 2023

   Contains: Further settings for development mode

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: DEBUG
   :value: False


.. py:data:: DEVELOPMENT
   :value: True


.. py:data:: STAGING
   :value: True


.. py:data:: BACKEND_SETTINGS
   :value: 'staging'


.. py:data:: USE_X_FORWARDED_HOST
   :value: True


.. py:data:: SECURE_PROXY_SSL_HEADER
   :value: ('HTTP_X_FORWARDED_PROTO', 'https')


.. py:data:: CSRF_COOKIE_DOMAIN
   :value: '.semper-ki.org'
